English: Describe the problem and how to recreate it.
Please turn on your hand controller to play!
Let go of the {trigger}\non both hands!
{Throwing} is fun, but\nwe need this part!
[Arf! Arf!]\nPush my nose when\nyou're ready to move on!
It's a {wheel}!\n{Move} it up a bit.
The {wheel} didn't go\nvery far. Let's fix\nthat! Press {stop}
As long as a {Stick} is\nattached, I'll {spin}!\nThere are some examples behind you.
I'm the [Jelly] ball!\nI want to get back [Home]!\n{Grab} me!
Adjust your car\nto reach the goal.
Press the {grip button}\nto move the entire Contraption
Nice! Let's save your contraption.\n{Grab} the {Helmet}
Let's {Save} your contraption.\nLook at the MiniMap.
You can also {Load}, {Share},\nor {Switch Levels} here.\nFor now, let's just take off the {Helmet}.
Press the [Pup]'s nose\nto advance to the next level!
Reach behind your {shoulder}\nto pull out a {stick}.\nLike you're pulling out a sword.
There is something {sticky}\nin your {right ear}.\nTry to pull it out.
This is called a {Sticky Ball}.\nIt will stop joints from {flopping} around.
This is an {Unpowered Wheel}.\nIt has no {engine}.
Welcome to the super-quick\n{Fantastic Contraption} demo!
Press the green button to\n{Start} Time
The object of this puzzle game\nis to get the {pink ball}\nto the {pink goal}
Use the {Start}/{Stop} button to\nget the {pink ball} home!
You might have to\nstraighten the car out...
This will delete the auto-saves for every level and reset back to the first tutorial. This will not delete contraptions saved on the save table. Great for starting a new game for your friends!

This will delete every single file in the game's data folder. All of your autosaves, anything saved on the '[local]' save table, any stored settings files, etc... A factory reset! The only file that will be saved is TwitchCredentials.json.
Please restart the game\nFor language change to take effect
